name: SocialDeterminantsOfHealthInterventions
title: Social Determinants of Health Interventions
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains interventions used to address social determinates of health problems.),(Data Element Scope: PROCEDURES.  The intent of this data element is to capture the interventions which address social determinants of health problems.),(Inclusion Criteria: any codes that describe an intervention used to address social determinants of health problems),(Exclusion Criteria: any codes that are not related to interventions used to address social determinates of health problems.)

concept.display: Assessment of progress toward goals to achieve food security (procedure)
Assessment of barriers in food insecurity care plan (procedure)
Coordination of resources to address food insecurity (procedure)
Counseling about nutrition using motivational interviewing technique (regime/therapy)
